replies.author: 『小亮D』
replies.txt_content:
storage 文件配置好后
查看
把PlayerPoints中的
config内配置改为
storage: mysql
mysql:
  host: localhost
  port: 3306
  database: minecraft
  user: root
  password: 1249412130
  table: playerpoints
  import:
    use: false
    source: YAML
  export:
    use: false
    source: SQLITE
  retry: 10
vote:
  enabled: false
  amount: 100
  online: false
restrictions:
  autocompleteOnline: false
  hasPlayedBefore: false
debug:
  database: false
  uuid: false
vault: false
version: 2.1.4

replies.txt_content: 同一台服务器上面吗？ 不是的话需要修改host并开启sql的远程访问
